> I am not aware of any mechanism to tell heritrix to terminate after
a cra=
wl. This does not it 
> doesn't exist though.  Perhaps someone else could c=
hime in.

It's not really an option, but a default behavior.

If you start =
Heritrix without the webui, and you provide an order.xml
for it to process,=
 then it will terminate after completing the job.

You also have to tell th=
e properties to auto start the job queue at
start up. The default is to hol=
d jobs, and if the jobs are on hold
then it will automatically start the we=
bui.

Heritrix.java -> search for "doOneCrawl".
